properties.property: update t_zdry_xsbx set zkzt = #[zkzt], sfzyry = #[sfzyry], gzqssj = to_date(#[gzqssj],'yyyy-MM-dd'), gydd = #[gydd], badw = #[badw], badwdh = #[badwdh], gyyy = #[gyyy], zyjsnzt = #[zyjsnzt], lkbssj = to_date(#[lkbssj],'yyyy-MM-dd'), qwbsqh = #[qwbsqh], sfcqyjbg = #[sfcqyjbg], jzqssj = to_date(#[jzqssj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), zzxz = #[zzxz], sfcqhjyfzcs = #[sfcqhjyfzcs], csmc = #[csmc], csdm = #[csdm], csxz = #[csxz], sfygdzy = #[sfygdzy], gzdwmc = #[gzdwmc], gzdwxz = #[gzdwxz], sfjjjj = #[sfjjjj], jjjjpdyj = #[jjjjpdyj], ysr = #[ysr], sfdjtwgdsy = #[sfdjtwgdsy], wgdsrpdyy = #[wgdsrpdyy], rcxfsfmxdysr = #[rcxfsfmxdysr], xfdrsrpdyj = #[xfdrsrpdyj], sfgzsjc = #[sfgzsjc], cjcjz = #[cjcjz], gcsj = to_date(#[gcsj],'yyyy-MM-dd'), cphm = #[cphm], sfgzfc = #[sfgzfc], fcjz = #[fcjz], gfsj = to_date(#[gfsj],'yyyy-MM-dd'), fwdz = #[fwdz], jqsfycwwffzxyrdkn = #[jqsfycwwffzxyrdkn], cwwfzxyrpdyj = #[cwwfzxyrpdyj], hszrdwdm = #[hszrdwdm], hszedwmc = #[hszedwmc], hsmjxm = #[hsmjxm], hsmjsfzh = #[hsmjsfzh], hssj = to_date(#[hssj],'yyyy-MM-dd'), hsddqh = #[hsddqh], hsddxz = #[hsddxz], xsqkms = #[xsqkms], czrxm = #[czrxm], czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], czsj = sysdate, czbs = #[czbs], lxfsbz = #[lxfsbz], zdrylxfs = #[zdrylxfs], czrsfzh = #[czrsfzh], qcxfzcs = #[qcxfzcs] where jlbh=#[jlbh]

select id, rybh, sfzh, gxrxm, gxrsfzh, gxrlxdh, gxrxzdxz, ydsrgx, isgdzy, djrxm, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') as djsj, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czdwdm, czdwmc, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') as czsj, czbs, gxrxb, to_char(gxrcsrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') as gxrcsrq from t_lsgl_rk_gxr where rybh=?

select jlbh, rybh, sfzh, zkzt, sfzyry, to_char(gzqssj,'yyyy-MM-dd') gzqssj, gydd, badw, badwdh, gyyy, zyjsnzt, to_char(lkbssj,'yyyy-MM-dd') lkbssj, qwbsqh, sfcqyjbg, to_char(jzqssj,'yyyy-MM-dd') jzqssj, zzxz, sfcqhjyfzcs, csmc, csdm, csxz, sfygdzy, gzdwmc, gzdwxz, sfjjjj, jjjjpdyj, ysr, sfdjtwgdsy, wgdsrpdyy, rcxfsfmxdysr, xfdrsrpdyj, sfgzsjc, cjcjz, to_char(gcsj,'yyyy-MM-dd') gcsj, cphm, sfgzfc, fcjz, to_char(gfsj,'yyyy-MM-dd') gfsj, fwdz, jqsfycwwffzxyrdkn, cwwfzxyrpdyj, hszrdwdm, hszedwmc, hsmjxm, hsmjsfzh, to_char(hssj,'yyyy-MM-dd') hssj, hsddqh, hsddxz, xsqkms, djrxm, djdwdm, djdwmc, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') djsj, czrxm, czdwdm, czdwmc, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') czsj, czbs, lxfsbz , zdrylxfs , qcxfzcs from t_zdry_xsbx where sfzh =?

insert into t_zdry_xsbx (jlbh, rybh, sfzh, zkzt, sfzyry, gzqssj, gydd, badw, badwdh, gyyy, zyjsnzt, lkbssj, qwbsqh, sfcqyjbg, jzqssj, zzxz, sfcqhjyfzcs, csmc, csdm, csxz, sfygdzy, gzdwmc, gzdwxz, sfjjjj, jjjjpdyj, ysr, sfdjtwgdsy, wgdsrpdyy, rcxfsfmxdysr, xfdrsrpdyj, sfgzsjc, cjcjz, gcsj, cphm, sfgzfc, fcjz, gfsj, fwdz, jqsfycwwffzxyrdkn, cwwfzxyrpdyj, hszrdwdm, hszedwmc, hsmjxm, hsmjsfzh, hssj, hsddqh, hsddxz, xsqkms, djrxm, djdwdm, djdwmc, djsj, czrxm, czdwdm, czdwmc, czsj, czbs, lxfsbz, zdrylxfs, czrsfzh, djrsfzh,qcxfzcs,zdrybh) values (#[jlbh], #[rybh], #[sfzh], #[zkzt], #[sfzyry], to_date(#[gzqssj],'yyyy-MM-dd'), #[gydd], #[badw], #[badwdh], #[gyyy], #[zyjsnzt], to_date(#[lkbssj],'yyyy-MM-dd'), #[qwbsqh], #[sfcqyjbg], to_date(#[jzqssj],'yyyy-MM-dd'), #[zzxz], #[sfcqhjyfzcs], #[csmc], #[csdm], #[csxz], #[sfygdzy], #[gzdwmc], #[gzdwxz], #[sfjjjj], #[jjjjpdyj], #[ysr], #[sfdjtwgdsy], #[wgdsrpdyy], #[rcxfsfmxdysr], #[xfdrsrpdyj], #[sfgzsjc], #[cjcjz], to_date(#[gcsj],'yyyy-MM-dd'), #[cphm], #[sfgzfc], #[fcjz], to_date(#[gfsj],'yyyy-MM-dd'), #[fwdz], #[jqsfycwwffzxyrdkn], #[cwwfzxyrpdyj], #[hszrdwdm], #[hszedwmc], #[hsmjxm], #[hsmjsfzh], to_date(#[hssj],'yyyy-MM-dd'), #[hsddqh], #[hsddxz], #[xsqkms], #[djrxm], #[djdwdm], #[djdwmc], to_date(#[djsj],'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #[czrxm], #[czdwdm], #[czdwmc], to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #[czbs],#[lxfsbz],#[zdrylxfs],#[czrsfzh],#[djrsfzh],#[qcxfzcs],#[zdrybh])

select jlbh, rybh, sfzh, zkzt, sfzyry, to_char(gzqssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as gzqssj, gydd, badw, badwdh, gyyy, zyjsnzt, to_char(lkbssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as lkbssj, qwbsqh, sfcqyjbg, to_char(jzqssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as jzqssj, zzxz, sfcqhjyfzcs, csmc, csdm, csxz, sfygdzy, gzdwmc, gzdwxz, sfjjjj, jjjjpdyj, ysr, sfdjtwgdsy, wgdsrpdyy, rcxfsfmxdysr, xfdrsrpdyj, sfgzsjc, cjcjz, to_char(gcsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as gcsj, cphm, sfgzfc, fcjz, to_char(gfsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as gfsj, fwdz, jqsfycwwffzxyrdkn, cwwfzxyrpdyj, hszrdwdm, hszedwmc, hsmjxm, hsmjsfzh, to_char(hssj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as hssj, hsddqh, hsddxz, xsqkms, djrxm, djdwdm, djdwmc, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as djsj, czrxm, czdwdm, czdwmc, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as czsj, czbs, lxfsbz, zdrylxfs,qcxfzcs from t_zdry_xsbx where sfzh = ? order by djsj desc
